orgId.description: The organization ID. The `API_KEY` must have access to this organization.

projectId.description: The project ID for which to return issue paths.

issueId.description: The issue ID for which to return issue paths.

snapshotId.description: The project snapshot ID for which to return issue paths. If set to `latest`, the most recent snapshot will be used. Use the "List all project snapshots" endpoint to find suitable values for this.

perPage.description: The number of results to return per page (1 - 1000, inclusive).

page.description: The page of results to return.

$ul: **last**: The URL of the last page of paths for the issue
**next**: The URL of the next page of paths for the issue, if not on the last page
**prev**: The URL of the previous page of paths for the issue, if not on the first page
**paths**: A list of the dependency paths that introduce the issue
**snapshotId**: The identifier of the snapshot for which the paths have been found
